opinion.court: Supreme Court of the United States
opinion.case_name: Harvey, Individually and as Beneficiary of the Arthur Harvey, M. D. Inc., Employee Defined Benefit Plan v. Salomon Smith Barney, Inc

opinion:
537 U.S. 1085

HARVEY, INDIVIDUALLY AND AS BENEFICIARY OF THE ARTHUR HARVEY, M. D. INC., EMPLOYEE DEFINED BENEFIT PLAN, ET AL.
v.
SALOMON SMITH BARNEY, INC.

No. 01-801.

Supreme Court of United States.

December 16, 2002.

1

CERTIORARI TO THE UNITED STATES COURT OF APPEALS FOR THE ELEVENTH CIRCUIT.

2

C. A. 11th Cir. Certiorari granted, judgment vacated, and case remanded for further consideration in light of Howsam v. Dean Witter Reynolds, Inc., ante, p. 79. Reported below: 260 F. 3d 1302.
